episode.title: Security Weekly #453 - Jeff Frisk & Jeff Pike, Global Information Assurance Certification
episode.about: This week on Security Weekly we interview Jeff Pike and Jeff Frisk from SANS GIAC. Paul and Larry talk about digital badges, CPEs, and SANS training. On Security Weekly, Paul, Larry, and Mike talk about the Hacker Summer Camp Planning Guide, Open DNS Blogs, wireless mics and keyboards, and excessive amounts of lube! The best place to get information about security! Stay tuned for the best in security news.
